external_games.name: Five Nights at F***boy's 2: Final Mix

name: Five Nights at F***boy's 2: Final Mix
storyline:
Toy Freddy wants to partake in a MIND-CRUSHINGLY AMAZING NIGHT OF PURE EXCITEMENT AND REVELRY but cannot do so until all of the security cameras around the pizzeria have been f***ed up. Thus begins his journey to shit on them…

Featuring the elusive Afterstory episode, which serves as an exciting conclusion to plotpoints set in motion in both F***boy's 1 and 2.
summary:
Five Nights at F***boy’s 2 is a FNaF fangame and sequel to surprise hit Five Nights at F***boy's created by Sable Lynn and Joshua Shaw in RPG Maker VX Ace.

This version includes the Final Mix: Game of the Year content, including the elusive Afterstory.
